collection:
This
privacy policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your
information when you visit our website and use our services.

Information We Collect

  * \- Personal Information:

This includes your name, email address, payment information, and other
personal data you provide when using our services.

* \- Usage Data:

We collect information on how you interact with our service, including IP
addresses, browser types, and access times.

* \- Cookies and Tracking Technologies:

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to personalize your
experience and analyze our website traffic.

We are not responsible for the data collected by our customers, Lemon Squeezy
or Stripe.
sharing:
This
privacy policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your

Sharing of Information

We may share your information with third parties in the following

* \- With service providers who assist us in our operations.
